overview: With only nine props and rapid role changes, Bodo Wartke tells the story of Oedipus, King of Thebes, who unknowingly kills his own father. And later, as a reward for liberating Thebes from the Sphinx, Jocasta, the king's widow and thus his own mother, is given in marriage.
tagline: Bodo's version of the classic tragedy is a solo theater with the piano cabaret artist in all 14 roles!
title: Bodo Wartke - König Ödipus
